overview: Following multiple plotlines with an unique assortment of tragicomic characters living along the Ventura Highway.  Thereâ€™s the retired police office, broken and homeless after the untimely death of his son during a birthday camping trip.  The elderly homebound father, hopelessly doomed to pantomime the sexual conquests of his glory days with an imaginary prostitute named Serenity.  The French midget writing his epic screenplay about a half-man/half-stuffed animal chauffeur.
title: Period Piece
